nodes.text: Sen Udo-Mal was a male Cerean Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as a Consular during the Republic Classic era.

A Force-sensitive Cerean, Sen Udo-Mal received training in the ways of the Force from the Jedi Order. Achieving the rank of Jedi Master, Udo-Mal had trained independently as a Consular and had constructed his own lightsaber with which he would uphold the principles of the Republic.
